ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |

| 1 |  | 2zrng.e | |- E = { z e. ZZ | E. x e. ZZ z = ( 2 x. x ) } |
| 2 |  | 2zlidl.u | |- U = ( LIdeal ` ZZring ) |
| 3 |  | 2zrng.r | |- R = ( ZZring |`s E ) |

| 6 | 2, 3 | #P_lidlrng | |- ( ( ZZring e. Ring /\ E e. U ) -> R e. Rng ) |
| 7 | 4, 5, 6 | #P_mp2an | |- R e. Rng |
